about.title: Introduction
about.subTitle: Overview.
about.content: With over 12 years of experience in software engineering management and technical leadership, I've been pushing the boundaries of mobile and web development. Since 2016, I've specialized in the OTT video space, working with nearly all aspects of streaming media. I developed a groundbreaking shared Swift library for iOS/tvOS apps, led the tvOS and Roku platforms at fuboTV, and served as Engineering Lead for VOD Encoding and Operations. Currently, as Engineering Lead of Video Innovations, I focus on developing server-side multi-view systems and just-in-time transcoding solutions. My leadership approach is deeply rooted in my service with the United States Marine Corps, where I served as an Infantry Squad Leader with the rank of Sergeant. For more details about my work, visit https://awesome.video.

experience.title: What I have done so far
experience.subTitle: Work Experience.

0.title: Engineering Lead, Video Innovations
points: Spearheaded the development of server-side multi-view systems
Engineered a just-in-time (JIT) transcoding and packaging solution for HEVC files
Deployed solutions in Kubernetes (k8s) for enhanced scalability and fault tolerance
Implemented persistent volumes and stateful sets for effective data management
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design scalable solutions

1.title: Engineering Lead, VOD Encoding & Operations
points: Led encoding, packaging, and operations of VODs (500+ hours of assets daily)
Reduced transcoding costs by 70% using AWS Spot Instances and container-based infrastructure
Engineered multiple codec streaming with DASH and HLS for 4K content
Built and maintained a serverless CDN Edge for seamless playback across OTT devices
Designed and implemented a live-to-VOD generator with DRM protection

2.title: Engineering Manager, AppleTV & Roku
points: Managed a team of 10 software engineers in the NYC office
Led product roadmap and engineering goals for AppleTV & Roku teams
Contributed code to both platforms while managing the teams
Designed and implemented workflow automation integrating with Jira
Delivered the first ever UHD/HDR10 live feed for OTT during World Cup 2018

3.title: Software Engineer, iOS
points: Rewrote the fuboTV's Swift player framework from the ground up
Reduced dependency on 3rd party vendor SDKs
Designed and measured overall video quality experience
Leveraged Apple's AVFrameworks
Built & designed fuboTV's In App Billing system

4.title: Principal Developer & Founder
points: Led a team of developers and designers in completing 15+ client projects
Managed client projects using agile methodologies
Utilized Apple's latest iOS APIs and frameworks
Designed and developed custom APIs leveraging AWS
Built & designed 4 different games in Unity3D with 1M+ users

work.subTitle: Projects.
work.description: Following projects showcase my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos. These projects reflect my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

0.name: JIT Transcoding and Packaging
0.description: A just-in-time transcoding and packaging solution optimized for HEVC source files. Deployed in Kubernetes for enhanced scalability and fault tolerance, this project significantly improved video streaming operations.

1.name: Server-side Multi-view Systems
1.description: Innovative system integrating multiple video feeds within a single player interface, revolutionizing content consumption for sports events and enhancing viewer experience through customizable viewing angles.

2.name: VOD Encoding & Operations Pipeline
2.description: Comprehensive solution for encoding, packaging, and delivering VOD content, handling approximately 500 hours of assets daily with support for multiple codecs and formats with DRM protection.
